enhanced_by.reason: The formData method relies on the elements method to gather form control elements associated with the form.
The formData method may need to be invoked after adding new form control elements to ensure the form data is up-to-date.
Both formData and submit methods prepare data for form submission, making assertions about formData more informed by the behavior of submit.
The formData method returns a list of key-value pairs similar to the elements method, which returns a list of form control elements. Assertions can be based on the similarity of these outputs.
